name: elin2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, c3)))

stmt.origin: bitri(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, c3)), wcel(c0, cin(c2, c3)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, c3)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cin(c2, c3)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cin(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, c3)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cin(c2, c3)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cin(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, c3)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cin(c2, c3)))
-| wceq(c1, cin(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, c3)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cin(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, c3)))
-| wceq(c1, cin(c2, c3))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, cin(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, c3)))
-| wceq(c1, cin(c2, c3))

comment: Membership in a class defined as an intersection. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.)
